name: Feeding Tru
description:
WASD / Arrow Keys - Move

Spacebar - Attack

Other controls showed in-game

You are a raccoon captured by the evil Troll named TRU! Everyone trembles under his name, you are forced to work for him, by cooking and keeping his territory safe. Will you be able to get the key and find his room? (not much of a challenge once you get the key) Play on to find OUT!

Please note - Sorry for the game giving an error after clicking restart. I am still learning and have no idea how to solve that.
